column7: Integrated optical and optoelectronic devices; theory of optical devices including laser sources, waveguides, photodetectors, and modulations of these devices. Prerequisite: One of ECE 455, ECE 487, PHYS 486. Recommended: ECE 488.
column9: Prerequisite: One of ECE 455, ECE 487, PHYS 486. Recommended: ECE 488.
